dsw.name: Department of Student Welfare (DSW)
dsw.response: This issue is handled by the Department of Student Welfare (DSW). Please visit the DSW office or contact the student welfare team.

egovernance.name: E-Governance / IT Support
egovernance.response: This issue is handled by the E-Governance Department. Please contact IT Support or visit the E-Governance office.

registrar.name: Registrar Office
registrar.response: This task is handled by the Registrar Office. Please visit the Registrar section for further processing.

examcell.name: Examination Cell
examcell.response: This is handled by the Examination Cell. Please contact the exam cell for official assistance.

accounts.name: Accounts & Finance Department
accounts.response: This task is handled by the Accounts/Finance Department. Please visit the Accounts section for help.

hostel.name: Hostel Office / Hostel Warden
hostel.response: This issue is managed by the Hostel Office or your respective Hostel Warden.

transport.name: Transport Department
transport.response: This matter is handled by the Transport Office. Please reach out to the Transport Department.

tpc.name: Training & Placement Cell (TPC)
tpc.response: This is handled by the Training & Placement Cell (TPC). Visit the TPC office or check CUIMS â†’ Placements.

department.name: Academic Department / HOD / Coordinator
department.response: This is handled by your Academic Department. Please contact your coordinator or HOD.

studentservices.name: Student Services Center
studentservices.response: This is handled by the Student Services Center. Please visit the Student Services Office for support.

medical.name: Medical Centre
medical.response: This is handled by the CU Medical Centre. For emergencies, call +91-160-3051002.

library.name: Library Department
library.response: This matter belongs to the Library Department. Please visit the CU Library help desk.
